best_model:
Pipeline(steps=[('preprocessor',
                 ColumnTransformer(transformers=[('num',
                                                  Pipeline(steps=[('imputer',
                                                                   SimpleImputer(strategy='median')),
                                                                  ('scaler',
                                                                   StandardScaler())]),
                                                  Index(['age', 'marital_status', 'education_level', 'num_of_children',
       'smoking_status', 'physical_activity_level', 'income',
       'alcohol_consumption', 'dietary_habits', 'sleeping_patterns'],
      dtype='object')),
                                                 ('cat',
                                                  Pipeline(steps=[('imputer',
                                                                   SimpleImputer(strategy='most_frequent')),
                                                                  ('onehot',
                                                                   OneHotEncoder(handle_unknown='ignore'))]),
                                                  Index(['history_of_substance_abuse', 'family_history_of_depression',
       'chronic_medical_conditions'],
      dtype='object'))])),
                ('classifier',
                 LGBMClassifier(learning_rate=0.01, max_depth=10,
                                n_estimators=250, num_leaves=20))])
